name: Red Candy Dog
description:
The 'Red Candy Dog' is the first Bitsy game I've made! It's a straight forward game.

After you've got the key look for an invisible exit in the same room which'll lead to another room with the meat.

The game will come to an end when you've collected the meat and the rabbit is satisfied.

Hopefully you're able to take an idea from my game and put it in your own game as a stepping stone to a game better than mine!
